body_html:
@girving
That's interesting. I submitted a pull request for the first change. I wasn't sure if it was a good idea to touch the layers bit, but feel free to edit.

I also noticed this on line 784 of nn_ops:

pooling_ops = {("MAX", 1): max_pool,                                                                           
               ("MAX", 2): max_pool,                                                                           
               ("MAX", 3): max_pool3d,  # pylint: disable=undefined-variable                                   
               ("AVG", 1): avg_pool,                                                                           
               ("AVG", 2): avg_pool,                                                                           
               ("AVG", 3): avg_pool3d,  # pylint: disable=undefined-variable                                   
              }

This is suggesting that max_pool functions as for dim 1, but I don't think this will work.

body:
@girving 
That's interesting.   I submitted a pull request for the first change.  I wasn't sure if it was a good idea to touch the layers bit, but feel free to edit.

I also noticed this on line 784 of nn_ops:

    pooling_ops = {("MAX", 1): max_pool,                                                                           
                   ("MAX", 2): max_pool,                                                                           
                   ("MAX", 3): max_pool3d,  # pylint: disable=undefined-variable                                   
                   ("AVG", 1): avg_pool,                                                                           
                   ("AVG", 2): avg_pool,                                                                           
                   ("AVG", 3): avg_pool3d,  # pylint: disable=undefined-variable                                   
                  }

This is suggesting that max_pool functions as for dim 1, but I don't think this will work.
